com.googlecode.starrating
Class StarMouseAdapter

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      com.googlecode.starrating.StarMouseAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
 class StarMouseAdapter
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

A MouseAdapter for receiving mouse events

Since:
version 0.9

          The source object's index if it's a Star or -1 if the source is a RemoveButton or ValueLabel

Constructor Summary
StarMouseAdapter(java.awt.Component source)
          Creates a StarMouseAdapter for a component that can be a Star or a RemoveButton or a ValueLabel If the component is not of one of these types an IllegalArgument exception is thrown
 
Method Summary
 void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
          If StarRating rating is enabled it sets the StarRating rate and the ValueLabel text to the one selected.
 void mouseEntered(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
          If StarRating rating is enabled it sets it's background color to white and opaque to true
If source is RemoveButton sets it's icon to the enabled one and the ValueLabel text to 0.0 If the source is a Star it sets the ValueLabel text according to the Star index
 void mouseExited(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
          If StarRating rating is enabled it sets it's opaque to false
If source is RemoveButton sets it's icon to the disabled one and sets the ValueLabel text to the StarRating rate

Constructor Detail

StarMouseAdapter

public StarMouseAdapter(java.awt.Component source)
Creates a StarMouseAdapter for a component that can be a Star or a RemoveButton or a ValueLabel If the component is not of one of these types an IllegalArgument exception is thrown

Parameters:
source - The source component of this event
Method Detail

mouseEntered

public void mouseEntered(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
If StarRating rating is enabled it sets it's background color to white and opaque to true
If source is RemoveButton sets it's icon to the enabled one and the ValueLabel text to 0.0 If the source is a Star it sets the ValueLabel text according to the Star index

Specified by:
mouseEntered in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
Overrides:
mouseEntered in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

mouseExited

public void mouseExited(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
If StarRating rating is enabled it sets it's opaque to false
If source is RemoveButton sets it's icon to the disabled one and sets the ValueLabel text to the StarRating rate

Specified by:
mouseExited in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
Overrides:
mouseExited in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

mouseClicked

public void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
If StarRating rating is enabled it sets the StarRating rate and the ValueLabel text to the one selected.
If StarRating is used as a StarTableCellEditor it stops the cell editing by calling AbstractCellEditor.stopCellEditing()

Specified by:
mouseClicked in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
Overrides:
mouseClicked in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
